name: SUPER MARIA RPG
description:
SUPER MARIA RPG

SUPER MARIA RPG is a short but sweet RPG. In less than three hours, you'll have explored unique towns, fought a horde of goofy baddies, and stopped an evil eggplant wizard from destroying the world. Are you up for the challenge?

In SUPER MARIA RPG you play as Maria, the last human in a world of monsters. After crossing paths with a rebellious fairy named Zari, Maria is dragged into a complicated scheme to defeat Zerybus and restore power to the Fae Clan, a shadowy and mysterious gang of fairies. Along the way, they meet up with the greatest assassin the monster world has ever known, Shades Nightblade, and together (in less than three hours of game time) they have the final epic confrontation with Lord Zerybus himself.

FOR FANS OF:
  • Super Mario RPG
  • Earthbound
  • Undertale
  • Early 90s SNES RPGs
CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Moving Around
X and Z - Interacting with the world / Pullin' up the menu screen
Shift - You can hold this down while walking to move faster!
